title: Can Primož Roglič and Red Bull Clip Pogačar’s Wings in 2025? ‘Tadej Is Unbeatable at the Moment’
content:
Roglič hints at return to Giro d'Italia in 2025 as Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe looks to satisfy 'super team' status: 'Improvements are possible in all areas'

Read the full article at Can Primož Roglič and Red Bull Clip Pogačar’s Wings in 2025? ‘Tadej Is Unbeatable at the Moment’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
